title: Bountiful
desc: Draw again. Double the crafting and gathering bonus of the next draw.

title: Wasteland
desc: Draw again. Halve the crafting and gathering bonus of the next draw (round down).

title: Clearing
desc: 0/+1/0. Do not calculate costs of building exteriors.

title: Treacherous
desc: Draw again. Halve the defense and crafting bonus of the next draw (round down).

title: Defensible
desc: Draw again. Double the defense and crafting bonus of the next draw.

title: Difficult Terrain
desc: Draw again. Halve the gathering and defense bonus of the next draw (round down).

title: Groundbreaking
desc: Draw again. Double the gathering and defense bonus of the next draw (round down).

title: Abandoned Buildings: Bunks
desc: Abandoned bunks (rank d3-1, 0 is broken) are available here.

title: Abandoned Buildings: Forge
desc: Abandoned forge (rank d3-1, 0 is broken) is available here
